Package com.example.syntaxeventlottery

Class Event

java.lang.Object
com.example.syntaxeventlottery.Event
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Event extends Object implements Serializable
Represents an event in the Event Lottery System.

  • Constructor Details

    • Event

      public Event()
      Default constructor required by Firebase.

    • Event

      public Event(String eventID, String eventName, String description, String facility, int capacity, Date startDate, Date endDate, String organizerId)
      Parameterized constructor to create an Event with specific details.
      Parameters:
      eventID - Unique identifier for the event.
      eventName - Name of the event.
      description - Description of the event.
      facility - Location or facility where the event is held.
      capacity - Maximum capacity of participants.
      startDate - Start date and time of the event.
      endDate - End date and time of the event.
      organizerId - ID of the organizer creating the event.

    • Event
